Delayed cold orders.label: Delayed cold orders
Delayed cold orders.description: Orders delayed beyond 1 hour arrive cold without cancellation

High Pricing.label: High Pricing
High Pricing.description: Perceived overpricing of items in the app

Poor Food Quality.label: Poor Food Quality
Poor Food Quality.description: Food was undercooked and contained foreign objects.

Unaccountable delivery delays.label: Unaccountable delivery delays
Unaccountable delivery delays.description: Late deliveries with no meaningful resolution

Unresponsive support.label: Unresponsive support
Unresponsive support.description: Lack of proper response from customer service

Cash on delivery unavailability.label: Cash on delivery unavailability
Cash on delivery unavailability.description: Instamart does not offer cash on delivery payment option

Missing items in delivery.label: Missing items in delivery
Missing items in delivery.description: Customer reports receiving fewer items than ordered, with no refund offered due to lack of proof.

Location detection failure.label: Location detection failure
Location detection failure.description: App fails to recognize user's location

Delivery personnel theft.label: Delivery personnel theft
Delivery personnel theft.description: Delivery personnel stealing money from orders

Forced automatic types.label: Forced automatic types
Forced automatic types.description: Automatic type assignments that are mandatory.

Dark mode theme.label: Dark mode theme
Dark mode theme.description: Request for a dark mode theme

Multiple account login restriction.label: Multiple account login restriction
Multiple account login restriction.description: Issue with logging in from multiple accounts on the same device

Add egg-based food indicator.label: Add egg-based food indicator
Add egg-based food indicator.description: Introduce a yellow indicator for egg-based items to improve food category filtering.

Failed UPI discount.label: Failed UPI discount
Failed UPI discount.description: Discount not applied after UPI payment failure

Worker Exploitation.label: Worker Exploitation
Worker Exploitation.description: Ethical concerns about unfair labor practices

App redundancy.label: App redundancy
App redundancy.description: Removing redundant apps after successful integration

Menu Originality.label: Menu Originality
Menu Originality.description: Accuracy of the restaurant's published menu

Blind accessibility issues.label: Blind accessibility issues
Blind accessibility issues.description: Challenges faced by blind users in accessing digital content

Monthly expense reports.label: Monthly expense reports
Monthly expense reports.description: Generate reports for Instamart and food orders by month and year

Credit card visibility.label: Credit card visibility
Credit card visibility.description: Issue with viewing HDFC credit card options

Delivery Area Restrictions.label: Delivery Area Restrictions
Delivery Area Restrictions.description: Limited or unavailable delivery service in certain locations

Address Change Issue.label: Address Change Issue
Address Change Issue.description: Unable to update or select a new address during delivery

Near-expiry product delivery.label: Near-expiry product delivery
Near-expiry product delivery.description: Receiving items with very short remaining shelf life

User search flow.label: User search flow
User search flow.description: Inefficient search experience with limited information and no dish previews

Vegetarian Filter.label: Vegetarian Filter
Vegetarian Filter.description: Display only vegetarian items from vegetarian hotels/messes

UI Simplification.label: UI Simplification
UI Simplification.description: Feedback on making the interface cleaner and more intuitive
